page.title: 11LAND USE IN THE WROTHAM AREA
page.content: The two main land uses in {Wrotham} and {Borough Green} are {Grassland} and {Housing}. In Wrotham there isn't any derelict land. In Wrotham there are some amenities that we don't have eg. Colleges, Job Centres, Hospitals, Cinema, Private Sports Grounds. {Farming} has got less land than it had in the 1960's. The cost of housing has gone up heavily costing now from 40 to 75 thousand pounds. The amount of livestock has decreased over the past 30 years due to the need for food and diseases such as foot and mouth.
